content.rendered:
La Verne Extended Learning’s Green Belt and Black Belt programs teach Lean Six Sigma process improvement projects from start to finish. Green Belt training allows you to deliver measurable, sustainable improvement by finding the root causes of problems and streamlining processes. In Black Belt training, you further develop your process improvement, project management, and leadership skills using clear language and plenty of practical examples.

The following Six Sigma certifications are offered by La Verne Extended Learning:

Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certificate

The Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certificate program is a virtual live, instructor-led program, designed to give students the skills to utilize the best practices from the Lean Six Sigma structured for improving and sustaining organizational processes, with the advanced skills to execute various methodologies. It utilizes key leadership principles and practices including Change Management, Team Formation and Management, and Critical Decision Making to drive and support related Lean processes.

Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate

The Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certificate program is an instructor led program, designed to give students the skills to utilize the best practices from the Lean Six Sigma structured approach to product and process improvements. This is accomplished through the elimination of waste by utilizing data-driven techniques to assist with attaining goals and measuring performance.
